greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Partial sums of Stern's diatomic series A002487.
comment: After the initial 0, identical to A007729, the 6th binary partition function.
link: Michael J. Collins, David Wilson, Equivalence of OEIS A007729 and A174868, arXiv:1812.11174 [math.CO], 2018.
formula: G.f.: (x/(1 - x))*Product_{k>=0} (1 + x^(2^k) + x^(2^(k+1))). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Feb 27 2017
a(2k) = 2*a(k) + a(k-1); a(2k+1) = 2*a(k) + a(k+1). - _Michael J. Collins_, Dec 25 2018
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, Dec 01 2010
